Html: Know ya'll are busy but could we possibly get the code fragments in the docs file cleaned a little so they actually appear readable.

Hi,

Thanks for your feedback on this topic. I will contact the product team to notify them about this. If you see a code section in the documentation that can be updated in a particular way or you have any suggestions on how to improve the code fragments,  it would be useful that you share it. This way, I could send a concrete scenario to the product team.

Please let me know if this helps.

Fernando Antivero
http://blogs.southworks.net/fantivero

We already have this on our todo list.  There was a problem with the conversion from our docs into the CHM.  We have identified the issue and it will be fixed in the next drop.  In the meantime, I do not think the docs in the August CTP downlaod have this issue, so you could use them.

Thanks,
Michael Puleio

@Michael

oh yes they do, they have some horrible formatting issues..
This has been fixed in the CHM included with the latest drop (drop 7):  http://compositewpf.codeplex.com/releases/view/51993
